title: Sri Lanka’s sympathy for the murdered British soldier and calls for “murdering British troops”
content: – by Shenali Waduge – All Sri Lankans are united in extending their sympathies to the family of 25 year old British army officer Drummer Lee Rigby who was cut and chopped to death in broad daylight by 2 Islamic protestors who were allowing themselves to be taped and gave a message to the world…
